## ContractEvents.removeTransactionListener() method

Remove a transaction listener

**Signature:**

```typescript
removeTransactionListener(listener: ListenerFn): void;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type       | Description            |
| --------- | ---------- | ---------------------- |
| listener  | ListenerFn | the receiver to remove |

**Returns:**

void
